results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project acab0dcd618c463b9109d716beb720f9. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when their password contains special characters.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types (including special characters) are supported and regression tests confirm functionality.
arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug

results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 0ea8cb21a8804017adacb62b8ce08e1e:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
